title: EnVy Overwatch WINS MLG LAS VEGAS - The Story

json.text: We're at MLG las vegas at the Mandalay Bay.
So basically the Overwatch situation was
Timo had to delay his flight through
a bunch of visa issues. We got them
situated but, unfortunately it took
longer than we thought.
Basically MLG is helping us with that
so we're moving into the next day which
which will be saturday and we're getting him here as fast as we can.
Should be an interesting day tomorrow.
Downtime? They're just going to bed early, drinking lots of water.
Some of them trying
the slot machines out, especially Hulk.
Tell me the secret to gambling in Vegas.
You put four dollars in, you get 600 dollars.
You cash out, and then you do the same thing the next day.
You put 200 in and you get 500.
But no, they're having some fun in Vegas. They're chilling out.
They are practicing a lot, as well.
So how are you feeling going into your next game?
Not sure.
Not sure?

Going into this event, we haven't practiced much
but we haven't practiced  much for a long time.
We've been dealing with a lot of things and
We won OGN through all the hardships,
and I think we'll be fine here in MLG Vegas, too.
Oh my god, I'm so tilted, dude.
I've been traveling for 40 hours straight.
40 hours, no kidding.
And we haven't even scrimmed for two weeks, but what can you do?
We love you Taimou! Hi Taimou!

it's not just his plane travel, he's also sick right now,
he has an ear infection, and yet I still think there's a good chance he comes out strong here today.
